title: PurplesBitcoins
author: PurplesBitcoins
created_time: August 06, 2023, 08:35:15 PMLast edit: August 09, 2023, 12:42:48 AM by PurplesBitcoins
content: BitcoinPurpleGlobal transactions for everyone around the worldBitcoinPurple (BTCP)A global freedom for all, currency fully decentralized, created to be a means of free transactions and without central command. Bitcoin Purple is a SHA-256 (25.0) coin, created and designed similarly to Bitcoin (BTC), with a similar purpose but faster transactions than Bitcoin Purple.Use your Bitcoin Purple as a store of value, as a means of exchange, payments and so you can be free to buy, store or collect.In a decentralized way, you can be part of Purple's, create integrations, applications, websites, make donations, mine, create mining pools, buy and sell, save. Be free worldwide using Bitcoin Purple.SHA-256 (25.0)RPC: 13495P2P: 13496Target spacing: 1 minuteTarget timespan: 120 minutesTransaction confirmations: 3 blocksMaturity: 100 + 1 confirmation blocksIt is only possible to mine one BTCP per Block, it is possible to mine only 1 000 000.Without pre-mining, all currencies are members of the mining community. https://www.bitcoinpurple.org/ https://twitter.com/BTCPurples https://www.reddit.com/user/BitcoinPurple/ https://github.com/BitcoinPurple/BTCPhttps://discord.gg/x3R9afVu https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5462282.new#new  http://explorer.bitcoinpurple.org/ https://weminerpool.site/ https://anomp.cc/getting_started/btcp https://altcoinspool.com/purple@bitcoinpurple.orgNode and block explorer can be made by community members.We are developing official ones too.Come be part of the beginning, we are starting the process of listing on the BitxOnex Exchange

comments.body: Hey! are you the guy who made bitcoin white and bitcoin dark?Come on dude, learn something to earn. Do you really believe you can hit a fortune just by creating a coin for a few dollars?

I don't have a computer or mining equipment and I wanted to help my mother with cancer.People who don't understand this either have terrible character and disposition or are the worst kind of human beings.Man, if you want to understand more, read the article where I explain this.https://coinmarketcap.com/community/post/346184491
